022import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.UTF8;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.splitString;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.createProcessingInstruction;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.createXMLDocument;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.createXMLElement;
031
032import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;
033import javax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory;
034import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
035import java.io.IOException;
036import java.nio.file.Files;
037import java.util.ArrayList;
038import java.util.Collection;

042import java.util.function.Consumer;

044import org.apiguardian.api.API;

049import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.stringconverter.URIStringConverter;
050import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.Namespace;
051import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.ProcessingInstruction;
052import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLDocument;
053import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLElement;

055import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
056import org.xml.sax.SAXParseException;
057import org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler;

059/**
060 *  Beautifies XML code.
061 *
062 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
063 *  @version $Id: XMLBeautifier.java 1101 2024-02-18 00:18:48Z tquadrat $
064 *  @since 0.4.2
065 *
066 *  @UMLGraph.link
067 */
068@SuppressWarnings( "UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr" )
069@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: XMLBeautifier.java 1101 2024-02-18 00:18:48Z tquadrat $" )
070@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.2" )
071@ProgramClass
072public final class XMLBeautifier
073{
074        /*---------------*\
075    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
076        \*---------------*/
077    /**
078     *  The implementation of
079     *  {@link DefaultHandler}
080     *  that is used to parse the XML code and to build the
081     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLDocument}
082     *  for the output.
083     *
084     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
085     *  @version $Id: XMLBeautifier.java 1101 2024-02-18 00:18:48Z tquadrat $
086     *  @since 0.4.2
087     *
088     *  @UMLGraph.link
089     */
090    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr" )
091    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: XMLBeautifier.java 1101 2024-02-18 00:18:48Z tquadrat $" )
092    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.2" )
093    private static final class XMLHandler extends DefaultHandler
094    {
095            /*------------*\
096        ====** Attributes **===================================================
097            \*------------*/
098        /**
099         *  The document for the output.
100         */
101        private XMLDocument m_Document;
102
103        /**
104         *  The element stack.
105         */
106        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
107        private final Stack<XMLElement> m_ElementStack = new Stack<>();
108
109        /**
110         *  The processing instructions.
111         */
112        private final Collection<ProcessingInstruction> m_ProcessingInstructions = new ArrayList<>();
113
114            /*--------------*\
115        ====** Constructors **=================================================
116            \*--------------*/
117        /**
118         *  Creates a new instance of {@code XMLHandler}.
119         */
120        public XMLHandler()
121        {
122            // Just exists â¦
123        }   //  XMLHandler()
124
125            /*---------*\
126        ====** Methods **======================================================
127            \*---------*/
128        /**
129         *  {@inheritDoc}
130         */
131        @Override
132        public final void endDocument() throws SAXException
133        {
134            m_ProcessingInstructions.forEach( m_Document::addProcessingInstruction );
135        }   //  endDocument()
136
137        /**
138         *  {@inheritDoc}
139         */
140        @Override
141        public final void endElement( final String uri, final String localName, final String qName ) throws SAXException
142        {
143            if( m_ElementStack.hasMore() ) m_ElementStack.pop();
144        }   //  endElement()
145
146        /**
147         *  {@inheritDoc}
148         */
149        @Override
150        public void error( final SAXParseException e ) throws SAXException
151        {
152            err.println( "*** ERROR! ***" );
153            e.printStackTrace( err );
154        }   //  error()
155
156        /**
157         *  {@inheritDoc}
158         */
159        @Override
160        public void fatalError( final SAXParseException e ) throws SAXException
161        {
162            err.println( "****** FATAL ERROR! ******" );
163            e.printStackTrace( err );
164        }   //  fatalError()
165
166        /**
167         *  Returns the output.
168         *
169         *  @return An instance of
170         *      {@link Optional}
171         *      that holds the beautified code.
172         */
173        public final Optional<String> getOutput()
174        {
175            final var retValue = Optional.ofNullable( m_Document )
176                .map( XMLDocument::toString );
177
178            //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
179            return retValue;
180        }   //  getOutput()
181
182        /**
183         *  {@inheritDoc}
184         */
185        @Override
186        public final void processingInstruction( final String target, final String data ) throws SAXException
187        {
188            m_ProcessingInstructions.add( createProcessingInstruction( target, data ) );
189        }   //  processingInstruction()
190
191        /**
192         *  Writes the given attributes to the target element.
193         *
194         *  @param  attributes  The attributes.
195         *  @param  attributeSetter The attributes setter method.
196         *  @param  namespaceSetter The namespace setter method.
197         */
198        private final void setAttributes( final Attributes attributes, final BiConsumer<? super String,? super CharSequence> attributeSetter, final Consumer<? super Namespace> namespaceSetter )
199        {
200            requireNonNullArgument( attributeSetter, "attributeSetter" );
201            for( var i = 0; i < requireNonNullArgument( attributes, "attributes" ).getLength(); ++i )
202            {
203                final var attributeName = isNull( attributes.getQName( i ) ) ? attributes.getLocalName( i ) : attributes.getQName( i );
204                final var attributeValue = attributes.getValue( i );
205
206                if( attributeName.startsWith( "xmlns" ) )
207                {
208                    final var nameParts = splitString( attributeName, ':' );
209                    final var uri = URIStringConverter.INSTANCE.fromString( attributeValue );
210                    final var namespace = nameParts.length == 1 ? new Namespace( uri ) : new Namespace( nameParts [1], uri );
211                    namespaceSetter.accept( namespace );
212                }
213                else
214                {
215                    attributeSetter.accept( attributeName, attributeValue );
216                }
217            }
218        }   //  setAttributes()
219
220        /**
221         *  {@inheritDoc}
222         */
223        @Override
224        public final void startElement( final String uri, final String localName, final String qName, final Attributes attributes ) throws SAXException
225        {
226            final var elementName = isNull( qName ) ? localName : qName;
227            if( isNull( m_Document ) )
228            {
229                m_Document = createXMLDocument( elementName );
230                setAttributes( attributes, m_Document::setAttribute, m_Document::setNamespace );
231            }
232            else
233            {
234                final XMLElement currentElement;
235                if( m_ElementStack.peek().isEmpty() )
236                {
237                    currentElement = createXMLElement( elementName, m_Document );
238                }
239                else
240                {
241                    final var parent = m_ElementStack.peek();
242                    //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
243                    currentElement = createXMLElement( elementName, parent.get() );
244                }
245                setAttributes( attributes, currentElement::setAttribute, currentElement::setNamespace );
246                m_ElementStack.push( currentElement );
247            }
248        }   //  startElement()
249
250        /**
251         *  {@inheritDoc}
252         */
253        @Override
254        public final void warning( final SAXParseException e ) throws SAXException
255        {
256            err.println( "WARNING!" );
257            e.printStackTrace( err );
258        }   //  warning()
259    }
260    //  class XMLHandler
261
262        /*------------*\
263    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
264        \*------------*/
265    /**
266     *  The XML to beautify.
267     */
268    private final String m_XMLCode;
269
270        /*--------------*\
271    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
272        \*--------------*/
273    /**
274     *  Creates a new instance of {@code BeautifyXML}.
275     *
276     *  @param  xmlCode The XML code to beautify.
277     */
278    public XMLBeautifier( final String xmlCode )
279    {
280        m_XMLCode = xmlCode;
281    }   //  XMLBeautifier()
282
283        /*---------*\
284    ====** Methods **==========================================================
285        \*---------*/
286    /**
287     *  The program entry point.
288     *
289     *  @param  args    The command line arguments.
290     */
291    @SuppressWarnings( "OverlyBroadCatchBlock" )
292    public static final void main( final String... args )
293    {
294        try
295        {
296            if( args.length == 1 )
297            {
298                final var file = FileStringConverter.INSTANCE.fromString( args [0] );
299                final var path = file.toPath();
300                final var xmlCode = Files.readString( path, UTF8 );
301                final var processor = new XMLBeautifier( xmlCode );
302                final var result = processor.process();
303                out.println( result );
304                out.println( "Done!" );
305            }
306            else
307            {
308                final var buffer = new StringJoiner( " " );
309                buffer.setEmptyValue( "[missing Filename]" );
310                stream( args ).forEach( buffer::add );
311                err.printf( "Invalid Command Line Arguments: %s %s%n", XMLBeautifier.class.getName(), buffer.toString() );
312            }
313        }
314        catch( final Throwable t )
315        {
316            t.printStackTrace( err );
317        }
318    }   //  main()
319
320    /**
321     *  Processes the XML code and returns the beautified version of it.
322     *
323     *  @return The beautified code.
324     *  @throws ParserConfigurationException    There is a problem on loading
325     *      the SAX parser.
326     *  @throws SAXException    A problem occurred while parsing the XML code.
327     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the XML code.
328     */
329    public final String process() throws ParserConfigurationException, SAXException, IOException
330    {
331        //---* Initialize the parser *-----------------------------------------
332        final var factory = SAXParserFactory.newInstance();
333        final var parser = factory.newSAXParser();
334
335        //---* Parse the XML code *--------------------------------------------
336        final var inputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream( m_XMLCode.getBytes( UTF8 ) );
337        final var handler = new XMLHandler();
338        parser.parse( inputStream, handler );
339
340        final var retValue = handler.getOutput()
341            .orElse( "<No Output>" );
342
343        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
344        return retValue;
345    }   //  process()
346}
347//  class XMLBeautifier
